about_the_game:
Discover the full story behind World of Islands in this detailed novel, the very foundation upon which the game is built. This eBook explores the world, characters, and conflicts in greater depth, allowing you to experience the rich history of the islands beyond the game itself.

Key Features:

  • Complete Novel: The full story that inspired World of Islands.

  • Expanded Lore: Learn more about the kingdoms, factions, and myths shaping the game's world.

  • Exclusive Early Access Bonus: Available as a free DLC only during Early Access.

Dive into the origins of World of Islands and enhance your adventure with the novel that started it all!
